name: Manual required - external API integration needed
description: Issue requiring external service setup should be manual_required

input.title: Add rate limiting with Redis
input.body:
## Description
We need to add rate limiting to our calculator API to prevent abuse.

## Requirements
- Use Redis for distributed rate limiting
- Limit to 100 requests per minute per IP
- Return 429 status when limit exceeded

## Notes
- Redis server needs to be provisioned
- Need to decide on Redis hosting (AWS ElastiCache vs self-hosted)
- Credentials will need to be configured in production
